content: I think I'll go with the Garlic and Lemon Roasted Asparagus. I love asparagus, and it sounds like a great way to cut the richness of the crab legs. Plus, it's easy to make and always a crowd-pleaser. By the way, speaking of crowds, I'm thinking of hosting a dinner party soon and I was wondering if you could help me with some decoration ideas? I want to create a beachy vibe to match the seafood theme, but I'm not sure where to start.
